mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports (uids, target_board_name, target_board_id, reason, reported_at, target_type, target_user, reason_2) SELECT #{uids}, #{target_board_name}, f.fid, #{reason}, current_date, 0, f.uids, #{reason_2} FROM free_board f LEFT JOIN reports r ON r.target_board_id = f.fid WHERE f.fid = #{fid} AND r.target_board_id IS NULL
